Cloud security is not limited to secure the infrastructure against attacks, it covers securing Cloud again configuration error, appliance to national and international regulations regarding the privacy of data and users Identity. It will be rater naïve to try to push the Cloud privacy to the providers’ side.

In practice, Cloud security is shared between infrastructure providers, the service providers, and the user of the Cloud. It is only when security requirements at the three levels (infrastructure, service, and users) are satisfied that we can talk about a secure Cloud environment (even if $100 \%$ security does not exist).
